description: This Java class, GlobalExceptionHandler, is a Spring Boot REST controller advice that provides centralized exception handling for REST endpoints. It standardizes error responses for specific exceptions such as ProductNotFoundException, validation errors, and generic exceptions.

classes.name: GlobalExceptionHandler
classes.description: A Spring Boot global exception handler that intercepts specific exceptions and formats consistent error responses with HTTP status codes and detailed messages.

methods.name: baseBody
methods.description: Creates a standard response body map containing timestamp, status, error message, and a general message.

methods.name: handleNotFound
methods.description: Handles ProductNotFoundException, returns a 404 Not Found response with error details.

methods.name: handleValidation
methods.description: Handles validation exceptions (MethodArgumentNotValidException), returns a 400 Bad Request with detailed field validation errors.

methods.name: handleGeneric
methods.description: Handles all other exceptions, returning a 500 Internal Server Error with exception details.
